doc.title: What Happened to the Burglar
doc.plot: "Very similar in its general details to No. 890 [The Disappointed Old Maid]. When the old maid discovers the man under the bed, however, she calls in a policeman, who drags the supposed burglar from under the bed, and is greatly disgusted to find it only a stuffed imitation. The woman thereupon faints in the policeman's arms."
